You can configure plugin from both the local default directory and POM file of your Maven project. 

The POM properties overwrites the same properties defined in the local default directory.

You must configure:

 * grinder properties file 
 * jython test file

You can also configure optional parameters from the POM file:

 * daemon_option -- the default value is *FALSE*. If you set *TRUE* the   agent goal run agent process with *-daemon* option

*CONFIGURATION FROM THE LOCAL DEFAULT DIRECTORY*
